name: Hypercube Warrior
description:
(play the updated web version at https://hypercube-warrior-web.herokuapp.com/postjam/, or the original LD50 version at https://hypercube-warrior-web.herokuapp.com/)

In the distant future, a new hit game show emerges.

Come play in HYPERCUBE WARRIOR, the ONLY Non-Euclidian game show around!

Shoot the bad guys!

Venture deep into the maze!

All good things must come to an end, but extend your time in the Hypercube by performing well. The monitor up top will let you know how you are doing!
